title: Full kitchen in apartment, Unfurnished apartments, Laundry facilities
posting_body: ['Craig Apartments in Las Vegas', 'Low Weekly & Monthly Rates', 'FREE Utilities', 'Free Premium Cable TV', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'Additional Information:', '<URL>', 'Apartment Home Features', '-Sparkling swimming pool', '-Apartment near Nellis Air Force Base', '-Free utilities included with apartment', '-Unfurnished apartments', '-On RTC Las Vegas bus lines', '-Bad Credit Ok', '-Near Las Vegas Speedway', '-High speed WIFI included', '-Fully furnished apartments', '-Large studio apartments', '-Free premium cable', '-Rent by the week or month', 'Free Siegel Reward Program', 'Earn points every time you pay your rent or refer a friend.', 'Use your points to treat yourself to', 'free rent, food, movies, gift cards', ', and much more!', 'Pet Policy', '20lb weight limit and aggressive breeds such as Pit Bulls and Rottweilers are prohibited.', 'Managed by The Siegel Group', 'Equal Housing Opportunity', 'Pricing may include current special and is subject to change without notice.']
